thread.title: Stephanie and Jeremy pictured back together as they reunite for baby Caben-Albi
thread.title_full: Stephanie and Jeremy pictured back together as they reunite for baby Caben-Albi

title: Stephanie and Jeremy pictured back together as they reunite for baby Caben-Albi
text:
Published 21st February 2017 
And it looks like newborn Caben-Albi may have healed their rift. 
Steph and Jez looked like the perfectly happy family as they walked their son around a park in Liverpool. 
After confirming he is Caben-Albi's father by DNA test, Jeremy flew from Ireland to Stephanie's home of Liverpool to meet his boy. 
SIOBHAN KELLY/WENN HAPPY FAMILY: Jeremy joined Stephanie in Liverpool to meet his son 
SIOBHAN KELLY/WENN PROUD PARENTS: The stars were seen cuddling Caben-Albi 
And the tattooed model looked like he was relishing fatherhood as he and his ex cooed over their baby. 
Stephanie, dressed in a warm fur-collared cardigan, pushed the pram containing her five-week-old son. 
The 23-year-old actress looked affectionate with her ex-boyfriend, with Steph touching Jez's arm as they talked. 
Jeremy, 26, soon got hands on with Caben-Albi, lifting the tot out of the pram for a cuddle. 
SIOBHAN KELLY/WENN AFFECTIONATE: Steph was seen touching Jez's arm as they walked Stephanie Davis' baby: a timeline of her pregnancy Thursday, 2nd February 2017 Take a look through the time timeline of Steph' pregnancy. 1 / 23 
SIOBHAN KELLY/WENN HANDS ON DAD: Jeremy took control of the pram to give Steph a break 
The Irish lad was seen holding the baby, who was wrapped up in white woollies and a hat, while Stephanie fixed his blanket. 
Jeremy later took charge of the pram, walking his son as he chatted with Stephanie. 
These pictures are sure to spark rumours that Stephanie and Jeremy are resuming their relationship following their baby joy. 
The stars met on Celebrity Big Brother while Stephanie was dating model Sam Reece, but fell in love despite the obstacles. 
SIOBHAN KELLY/WENN UNITED FRONT: The couple have put their rocky past behind them Stephanie and Jeremy's love story Friday, 11th March 2016 Jeremy flies out to Spain to win Stephanie back. Here's a document of their turbulent love-affair during CBB and all over social media. 1 / 24 Aj/iCelebTV.com Stephanie Davis and Jeremy Mcconnell hold hands in Liverpool 
However, when they emerged from the house, their whirlwind romance set off on a seriously rocky path. 
The couple split several times over their four-month relationship, with the fling descending into a series of public social media spats. 
Shortly after they split for good, Steph discovered she was pregnant, with Jez doubting the paternity of the baby. 
Following the birth of Caben-Albi, Jeremy took a DNA test live on This Morning to find out whether he was the daddy - and the results were positive. 
INSTAGRAM APPLE OF THEIR EYES: Caben-Albi is now five weeks old Related videos
